title: Dr. Preston Sprinkle's Story: The Bible, Sexuality, Joker, Jordan Peterson, Kanye West
description:
Dr. Preston Sprinkle founded the Center for Faith, Sexuality and Gender. After a conversion experience he pursued his studies in the Bible from John MacArthur's Master's University and Seminary. It gave him a desire to study the Bible and hold true to its teachings rather than the doctrinal standards of that system. He got a PhD in New Testament from Aberdeen going on to teach first at Cedarville University then Francis Chan's Eternity Bible College. He has spent his career working to open up the Bible on controversial topics to where he currently helps churches and Christian institutions try to apply biblical teaching on sexuality to their circumstances. He has a podcast "Theology in the Raw". I was a guest on an episode about Jordan Peterson. Here we talk for nearly two hours examining his story and touching on both Christian culture and the culture beyond. 

Center for Faith, Sexuality and Gender https://centerforfaith.com/
Theology in the Raw Podcast https://www.prestonsprinkle.com/theology-in-the-raw
His episode with me https://www.prestonsprinkle.com/theology-in-the-raw/2019/3/11/729-a-conversation-with-paul-vander-klay
Preston Sprinkle Books https://amzn.to/2XwvoJJ
